com.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.utility

Class JavaVersionUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.pulsebeat02.minecraftmedialibrary.utility.JavaVersionUtilities

  • public final class JavaVersionUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for determining the version of the Java Runtime Environment and throwing a warning if necessary. A warning is printed into the log file if the major Java version is not 11 or greater.
